FuncDef: This command defines a flow data collector for cflowd data. The IP address of the flow collector must be specified. The UDP port number is an optional parameter. If it is not set, the default of 2055 is used.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address of the flow data collector in dotted decimal notation.
Specifies the UDP port of flow data collector. Values-1 to 65535. ParamDefault: Default- 2055
Keyword used to create the flow data collector.
